name: Legend of Zelda: Interactive Game Poster
name_original: Legend of Zelda: Interactive Game Poster
description: This is a poster for the Legend of Zelda that allows you to interact with it by clicking the different underlined words based off of the Ocarina of Time US commercials. Click them to experience different variations of the poster based off of the many games throughout the series' history!  There's even a surprise link if you manage to find it........
